armorstatues.item.armor_stand.descriptio: Shift + right-click to open configuration screen when placed.
armorstatues.screen.style.invisible.tool: Makes the armor stand itself invisible, but still shows all equipment.
armorstatues.screen.style.showArms.toolt: Enables the armor stand's arms, so it may hold items in both hands.
armorstatues.screen.style.showName.toolt: Render the armor stand's name tag above it's head.
armorstatues.screen.style.small.tooltip: Makes the armor stand half it's size like a baby mob.
